answers.answer: For exaple yesterday she had two waffles, a banana, gram crackers, strawberries, a whole can ravioli's, a whole chicken breast, corn, salt potatoes, and a peanut butter and jelly sandwich... and still said she was hungry.I'm pregnant and i can't even eat that much!Problem?

Yes my daughter who's 8 does the same thing! For dinner she can eat 3 tacos or 3 sloppy joes! This is more than I eat! The dr said when lil girls eat like this its a growth spirt. Especially if there arms,legs and head hurts from time to time.

Donielle,  since your daughter is underweight,  don't restrict her intake.  She needs food.I would suggest you catalog what she eats during the day,  and present that to her doctor.  It sounds like she may have a metabolic disorder,  or juvenile diabetes,  that's keeping her feeling starved and thin although she eats a lot.This is a health issue,  not a behavioral one.
I think she needs to be seen by a doctor and explain all the symptoms in detail.

question: My four year old daughter is constantly say she is hungry. I mean every half hour! My family is very traditional in the sense that we eat all of our meals together at the table. My boyfriend and I have noticed that she out eats us both. Recently we have been trying to limit how much she gets. Even after eating a huge meal, she'll ask for dinner again in a half hour. Her doctor says she's under weight on the bmi chart. But every time she eats her belly gets hard and distended, but still wants more. Anyone else experience this? If so, what have you done?
title: My 4 year old never stops asking to eat!
